summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackMoroccanoil Intense Curl Cream is a leave-in conditioner infused with vitamins and antioxidant-rich argan oil to keep curls soft, defined, and hydrated.
details: DetailsBenefitsDefines and refreshes curlsHydratesEnhances shineLeaves no sticky residueWeather-safe; protects against frizzKey IngredientsArgan Oil: Restores elasticity, smoothness, and manageability to hairPolyquaternium-7: An antistatic agentTocopheryl Acetate: A form of vitamin EItem 2644248How To UseAfter shampooing and conditioning, apply a generous amount to damp hair. Rake evenly through hair. Let air dry.Caution: Use product only as directed. Avoid contact with eyes. In case of contact, rinse immediately with water. For external use only.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Cetyl Alcohol, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Parfum/Fragrance, Dimethicone, Glyceryl Stearate, Glyceryl Distearate, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil, Hippophae Rhamnoides (Sea Buckthorn) Fruit Oil, Cetrimonium Chloride, Polyquaternium-7, Stearic Acid, Glycerin, Illite, Sodium Stearate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Caprylyl Glycol, Myristyl Alcohol, Stearyl Alcohol, Citric Acid, Tocopherol, Chlorphenesin, Sodium Benzoate, Phenoxyethanol, Hydroxycitronellal, Linalool, Benzyl Benzoate, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone. MOLCC03
how_to_use: After shampooing and conditioning, apply a generous amount to damp hair. Rake evenly through hair. Let air dry.Caution: Use product only as directed. Avoid contact with eyes. In case of contact, rinse immediately with water. For external use only.

reviews.headline: So glad this is available at Ulta
reviews.comments: I've been using this product for more than five years. It is the perfect leave-in for coarse or kinky curls. I have purchased previously only in a salon. I love that this will be available for purchase in a couple of days.
